Critical materials like copper, iron ore, lithium are in short supply and dangerous to mine. One billion people live less than 10 meters above rising oceans, 1 in 6 people live in areas with significant wildfire risk, 43% of critical infrastructure is in disrepair and will cost $2.6T to fix, and pollution from the Manhattan Project is still being cleaned up with a $300B invoice, food production must increase 60% to feed 2050 population, it will take 757 years to remove mines in Ukraine with traditional methods. What do these problems have in common? One, our civilization does not have a feasible way to address challenges of this magnitude. Two, earthmoving is a key part of the solution. Our commercially deployed autonomy product runs a wide range of existing earthmoving machinery (new, older, large, small, any brand). As a result, our customers run their operations at maximum throughput and safety. The AIM platform unlocks tremendous value across mining, construction, and defense. AIM has been built by world-class engineers who developed cutting-edge products Google, Waymo, Tesla & SpaceX. We bring deep expertise in autonomy, robotics, hardware, and advanced AI deployed at scale.

Baller produces unique digital assets that, unlike other blockchain tokens, can be placed into real-world environments and viewed from 360 degrees in high-definition 3D - both inside and outside of the metaverse. The authenticity and individual ownership of each Baller asset is verifiable on the blockchain, solving the long-standing problem of fraud and counterfeits in the collectibles market.  These tokens also unlock exclusive experiences with athletes, entertainers, teams and leagues. --- > Yahoo - "Baller became the first to create and sell an augmented reality NFT ("3D-AR NFT") of an autographed collectible.” > Benzinga - "Baller Mixed Reality, a cutting-edge start-up venture that is pioneering the development of Autographed Metaverse Collectibles in the form of 3D-AR NFTs... a major innovation in sports memorabilia.” > Bloomberg - "Another benefit of Baller's ground-breaking NFTs is that they leverage blockchains to solve the long-standing problem of counterfeit items in the collectibles market... eliminating the potential for fraud and false ownership claims." > "NFTs Are 4 Ever" Podcast - "A significant experimentation into the metaverse. Very innovative... a potentially legendary collection. This mixed reality could be more valuable than items in the real world.” More at https://www.stronginteractive.io/baller

Description: Aerospace, Generative Ai, Drones, DaaS, SaaS, Data, Disaster Response, Wildfire
Top 5 Investors: Founding Team Ember Flash
Founders: Founding Team Ember Flash, Joseph Norris, Lee Kohlman
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Consumer Electronics, Consumer Goods, Data and Analytics, Hardware, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Ember Flash Aerospace's innovative technology aims to revolutionize wildfire management by utilizing Ultra Long Endurance UAVs and combining multiple data streams from various sources. Their proprietary Generative AI platform can process and analyze this data in real time, providing actionable insights to firefighters on the ground. In addition to its own data sources, Ember Flash Aerospace integrates data from a wide range of public and private sources, including satellite imagery, smoke cameras, and weather data, to create a comprehensive picture of the wildfire situation. The company's Ultra Long Endurance UAVs can fly or hover over specific zones for extended periods, allowing them to gather and transmit data continuously. Through their research, Ember Flash Aerospace has found that their UAVs can detect the spread of fires and accurately map the affected areas, providing real-time data and insights that will help firefighters strategize and plan their firefighting efforts more effectively. Their Generative AI platform will also help firefighters identify areas where people may be trapped or need assistance, allowing them to direct their efforts more efficiently. With its experienced management team, strong financial projections, and cutting-edge technology, Ember Flash Aerospace is well-positioned for long-term success and growth in the disaster response industry. By leveraging the power of Ultra Long Endurance UAVs and Generative AI mapping and decision-making, Ember Flash Aerospace looks forward to making a significant impact in the fight against wildfires and revolutionizing the way we approach disaster response.

Enterprise brands like Samsung, Zomato, vivo, and Swiggy uses Gan.ai to run hyper-personal video campaigns with celebrities, leaders, and other stakeholders, calling out users' names, locations, order items, nearby stores, etc— maximizing CTRs, ROI & impact of campaigns. Whether it’s email, SMS, social media, WhatsApp, pre-roll ads, IPTV, mobile apps, personalized checkout, landing pages, or anything brands require, Gan.ai integrates with it. Before Gan.ai, brands could only make personalized text-based campaigns, inserting the name of the user in an email or SMS, or at best as a text graphic inside a video. With Gan.ai, the name of the user (and other variables) can be spoken out by the actor in the video, leading to much higher engagement, conversions, click-through rates, and brand recall for brands in their marketing campaigns.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology, Machine Learning
Description: Know what your model does not know.
Top 5 Investors: E14 Fund, Mozilla Ventures, Intel Ignite, E62 Ventures
Founders: Alexander Amini, Daniela Rus, Elaheh Ahmadi
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Themis AI is a software development company addressing critical obstacles to the responsible deployment of AI, such as unreliable outputs and hallucinations. The solution: Capsa, a proprietary product platform that automatically adds compute-efficient uncertainty quantification to any AI model, allowing software developers across the globe to de-risk their models. Founded in 2021 by Dr. Daniela Rus, Dr. Alexander Amini, and Elaheh Ahmadi, Themis AI is an MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory spinoff grounded in more than ten years of foundational research.  Driven by a team of world-class machine learning experts, Themis AI developed Capsa to equip AI professionals with the feedback they need to de-risk their models. Capsa can surgically update the architecture of any model within seconds so that the model can quantify its own uncertainty. With Capsa, AI models can flag their own mistakes and hallucinations, unlocking AI’s potential across new industries while enabling quality assurance. Capsa makes developing and running safe AI models less expensive and more efficient, saving on costly AI chips and cloud computing and decreasing time to market. As Themis AI continues to grow, it aims to make its state-of-the-art advancements in safe and reliable AI accessible to machine learning engineers and customers around the world. AI is a forecast machine to a fault. How confident should you be in the AI that serves you and your customers? Themis AI’s Capsa can tell you.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Generative AI, Human Resources, Recruiting
Description: Skillful.ly builds AI-powered simulations enabling employers to see skills in action before they hire.
Top 5 Investors: Better Ventures, Social Impact Capital, Inventus Capital Partners, Helium-3 Ventures, American Student Assistance
Founders: Brett Waikart, Johnson Kanjirathinkal, Karthik Ravi
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Professional Services, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Skillfully was founded on the belief that hiring should be efficient, inclusive, and skills-centric. Through experiential hiring methods using virtual simulations, employers now see applicant skills in action. This solution uncovers the perfect fit for a role before the interview phase, saving HR teams time, money, and effort. For decades, recruiters have relied on resume-based hiring to superficially qualify candidates by parsing applicant descriptions of skills to determine employability. The rise of AI tools that automatically enhance and submit applications at an unprecedented scale has overwhelmed employer pipelines, making accurate and precise decision-making nearly impossible. Enter Skillfully’s recruitment solution - HiredNow. The HiredNow tool allows employers create custom simulations of real-life, on-the-job scenarios to effectively assess an applicant’s actual skill level. For the first time, employers can see an applicant’s skills firsthand to determine if their abilities match the unique requirements of a job opening before engaging with the applicant directly. These simulations provide a precise skills scorecard for every applicant, vastly improving hiring efficiency compared to traditional resume-driven tools and enabling skills-first hiring at scale. Through the Skillfully platform, employers can also hire directly from our exclusive, skill-verified TalentNetwork, which includes national career partners such as leading universities, community college systems, HBCUs and workforce development organizations. Employers hiring from our TalentNetwork get access to a deeply diverse and highly motivated candidate pool often overlooked by conventional resume-first hiring tools and professional networks. In this new Age of AI “Good on Paper” is no longer good enough for employers searching for the very best talent. Discover how Skillfully can transform your hiring process today!

Full Description: Hardware-free scalable and sustainable AI. We are democratizing Artificial Intelligence through software innovations. UNIQUE APPROACH. ThirdAI accelerator builds hash-based processing algorithms for training and inference with neural networks. The technology is a result of 10 years of innovation in finding efficient (beyond tensor) mathematics for deep learning.  Our algorithmic innovation has demonstrated how we can make Commodity x86 CPUs 15x or faster than most potent NVIDIA GPUs for training large neural networks.   The demonstration has shaken the common knowledge prevailing in the AI community that specialized processors like GPUs are significantly superior to CPUs for training neural networks.   Several media outlets echo our technological superiority:  IEEE Spectrum describes, "What they report is stunning."  Investorplace considers the algorithm one of the biggest threats to NVIDIA Stock (a $500  billion company).  Engadget calls it a "Completely different approach to Deep Learning".  A quote from WCCFTech says, "If an implementation of this algorithm is mainstreamed it would almost instantly disrupt the dynamics of the deep learning ecosystem. Valuations of companies could change overnight." Our innovation would not only benefit current AI training by shifting to lower-cost CPUs, but it should also allow the “unlocking” of AI training workloads on GPUs that were not previously feasible.

Celeris One leverages structure-based geometric deep learning to prioritize specific E3 ligases, design linkers, and select the most active compounds for synthesis. Celeris Therapeutics collaborates with pharma and biotech companies to jointly discover and develop small-molecule degrader medicines for all therapeutic areas. Memory-Augmented Sales Agent Embedded within Gmail, Salesforce, and Slack, this agent continuously analyzes deal state and team context to recommend timely interventions, such as reaching out to an economic buyer, complete with a drafted email already waiting in your inbox. 	2.	Deal Risk Detection Engine A fine-tuned model trained on your company’s historical deals and customer conversations (CRM, email, and call transcripts), scoring active opportunities and surfacing interpretable risk factors - giving leaders visibility and control before pipeline slips. 	3.	Real-Time Coaching Layer A coaching layer that listens to live videoconferencing calls and triggers contextual cue cards — such as battle cards, talk tracks, or discovery questions — based on conversational intent and flow. Copilot is trusted by high-performing mid-market and enterprise teams, and built for secure, compliant, and deeply integrated deployment across your GTM teams.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Cyber Security, Machine Learning
Headquarters Location: Winston Salem, North Carolina, United States
Description: Salem Cyber provides enterprise level cyber tradecraft to organizations to scale challenges of cyber alert investigations.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Salem Cyber builds Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions that work collaboratively with people to address scalability challenges in cybersecurity operations. We believe AI is most effective when it can collaborate with people, merging their creativity and institutional knowledge with the scalability of machines. Their product, Salem, is an AI-based cyber analyst designed to increase the number of alert investigations your organization can perform. Salem runs a tier 1 and 2-style investigation on the 100’s or 1000’s of alerts that are too noisy to go into your SOC, and then escalates back the handful that are most likely to be actual cyber threats. By running in some cases 100x or more investigations, Salem gives you the opportunity to identify threats that might have previously flown under the radar, leading to a decreased time-to-detect and an increased ROI of other cyber detection tech you’ve invested in. The company was founded in 2021 and is headquartered in Winston-Salem, North Carolina.

Description: Transforming mental healthcare for parents.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Education, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Fifty-one percent of mothers report feeling depressed and 42% report crying due to overwhelm at least a few times a week. Between 2008 and 2018 there was a 30% increase in parent-reported stress, while today 62% of parents find at least some aspects of parenting “extremely stressful.” We're in the midst of a parent mental health crisis. Modern parenting is H-A-R-D, and we’re here for it. Yes Collective is transforming mental healthcare for parents with the first-of-its-kind digital mental wellness platform that solves the interconnected problems of modern family life through coach-led guidance, step-by-step practice, and community support. Our collective is an expert team of doctors, therapists, psychologists, and behavioral health coaches who translate cutting-edge science and expert wisdom on all facets of parent mental health & wellness into actionable, simple, and effective tools for self-healing and multi-generational wellbeing. We combine parent-focused expert knowledge and practice into a mobile ecosystem of AI-assisted emotional fitness coaching, live therapist-led events, daily articles and recordings from the experts, and a private, facilitated social network just for parents. Yes Collective is stepping up to transform mental and emotional healthcare for all parents by making expert therapeutic tools, practices, and one-on-one support accessible, bringing expert care right into their back pockets. We’re helping families become happier and healthier, one parent at a time.

Full Description: Vikk AI is a data-driven, AI-powered legal technology platform that is transforming access to legal assistance for consumers and redefining client acquisition and productivity for lawyers. Headquartered in California, Vikk AI provides a 24/7 digital legal assistant capable of delivering instant, accurate, and private guidance across more than 50 legal categories and in over 30 languages, with responses tailored to each user’s state laws. Users can ask legal questions, upload documents for AI analysis, and, when needed, seamlessly connect with verified, independent lawyers—bridging the persistent gap between legal demand and lawyer supply. For consumers, Vikk AI democratizes legal support by making it affordable, accessible, and easy to understand, removing barriers of cost, complexity, and geography. For legal professionals, Vikk PRO offers a dedicated portal to receive qualified leads, utilize AI-powered productivity tools, and—crucially—access the Vikk Data Hub: a real-time analytics engine that leverages anonymized, proprietary data from tens of thousands of legal interactions to reveal actionable trends in legal demand by state, category, and keyword. This data-driven approach empowers lawyers to make smarter marketing and business decisions, while continuously improving the AI’s accuracy and relevance. Vikk AI is not a law firm, but a technology startup empowering both individuals and legal professionals. Since its 2024 launch, Vikk AI has served tens of thousands of users in all 50 states, processed tens of thousands of legal cases, and is rapidly scaling through a subscription and lead-generation model—while building one of the most valuable real-world legal data assets in the industry.

Full Description: Founded by data scientists from Google and BCG-Gamma, Charles River Data offers bespoke data science solutions, including personalized marketing, scheduling, operations, dynamic pricing, inventory management, sales optimization, network optimization and other machine-learning driven decision tools. The CRD team has previous experience building large-scale data applications in industries including retail, GIS, defense, healthcare, insurance, manufacturing, private equity and finance/banking. Our leadership team brings together talent from data science consulting and big tech to build practical AI solutions that can scale with our growing clients. The CRD delivery model pairs the most talented engineers with a world-class kit of technology and project delivery tools. Charles River helps our clients solve critical business problems, focusing on long-term impact through experimentation and data insights. After the Great Resignation, many tenured data science professionals gave up on traditional hierarchies in favor of a more impactful career. CRD arose out of this historic moment, and we understand the career priorities of exceptional engineers, allowing CRD to recruit only extraordinary talent. Our consulting clients range from start-ups to multinationals looking to augment their data science capabilities or quickly solve a critical business problem. CRD can also provide full data science team outsourcing for companies that want to move quickly into the machine learning age.  We are a team of builders and tech enthusiasts, and we use our passion and expertise for data to create exponential results for our clients.

Description: Fleksa is the Restaurant OS that transforms the entire customer journey, both in-store and online.
Top 5 Investors: Right Side Capital Management, MARL 5G Accelerator, NCA, German Accelerator
Founders: Bhagwati Bhushan Mishra, Shashi Bhushan Mishra
Industry Groups: Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Food and Beverage, Sales and Marketing, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Fleksa is an all-in-one solution designed to help restaurants build their online presence and streamline operations through advanced AI-powered tools. Here’s how Fleksa can support restaurants: AI-Powered Restaurant Website Builder: Fleksa offers a fully branded website and mobile app, personalized for each restaurant, ensuring your online presence is optimized for search engines like Google. This allows restaurants to attract more customers and guarantees ranking improvements on Google within 90 days, driving more visibility and orders​. Commission-Free Ordering and Reservations: Fleksa provides restaurants with their own direct ordering and reservation system, eliminating the need for third-party platforms that charge high commissions. This system integrates seamlessly into the restaurant’s branded website and app, allowing customers to place orders for delivery, pickup, or dine-in without extra fees​. Cloud POS System: Fleksa’s Cloud POS supports restaurants on Windows, iOS, and Android, providing an integrated platform for managing orders, reservations, payments, and customer data all in one place. It allows for real-time order management, syncing both online and in-person operations efficiently​. QR Code Ordering and Payment: Fleksa supports modern dining experiences with QR code-based table ordering and payments. Customers can scan a QR code to access the menu, place orders, and pay, all from their mobile devices, streamlining the dining process and reducing wait times​. Automated Marketing and Loyalty Programs: Fleksa offers integrated marketing tools, including automated email and SMS campaigns, as well as loyalty and rewards programs. This helps restaurants engage with their customers, increase repeat business, and create personalized marketing strategies​. Google Food Ordering Integration: Fleksa integrates directly with Google’s Food Ordering service, making it easier for customers to discover and order from the restaurant directly through Google. This further enhances the restaurant’s online visibility and customer accessibility​. With these features, Fleksa empowers restaurants to manage their operations more efficiently while increasing revenue through a direct, commission-free model.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), EdTech, Education, Language Learning, Machine Learning
Description: The only one completely passive AI-driven vocabulary-building app. We solve the biggest pain - the lack of time.
Top 5 Investors: Loyal VC, Innovation Capital
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Education, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Worddio is an AI-driven vocabulary-building app. We are growing our user base at a rapid pace because we offer our customers: - The unique feature to learn words without touching their smartphone. - 34 languages that cover 90% of the world's population. Our in-house AI/ML models help us in: - Building individual learning paths. - Optimizing marketing costs. - Deep user database segmentation (psychological, behavioral, and interests based) Customer Problem The main problem we face is the language barrier between peoples. This specifically applies to EU as a multi-lingual community. From other hand the biggest challenge for learning a foreign language is time. Advanced online technologies provide many learning opportunities but all of them require 100% focus for a long period of time which many people do not have. Products & Services To solve this problem, we turned the flashcards that students often use to memorize words into audio flashcards. Over 2000 people say that Worddio is a great tool for learning new words. With Worddio you can learn new words on the move or while doing something else, without touching your phone. Through this method, the learner will also memorize the pronunciation in the correct way, spoken by a native language speaker. We safe students time! Target Market The Worddio app is designed specifically for people learning a foreign language and who don't have time to learn and memorize new words. The Global Online Language Learning Market was valued at $12.49 billion in 2019 and is projected to reach $25.73 billion by 2027. With its 34 languages Worddio has potential usefulness for over 90% of the world population. Does it work? We have more than 200K installations and more than 1300 paying users. Business Model - subscriptions: 1, 3, 6 and 12 months, lifetime - up-sales of premium content - advanced flashcards by topics, Audiobooks and Podcasts. - Ads - general or targeted based on user profiles - Apply data & technology to other platforms/apps/fields . . . Developing a B2C model on a global level takes time and resources to break even, but once that happens, the return on investment is maximized at scale. Customer Segments Professionals: adults looking to improve their foreign-language skills for business or career reasons Casual learners: travelers, expats, or other persons wishing to learn a new language or enhance their current knowledge Sector-specific: Service workers, such as call-center staff or healthcare workers, who can perform better with a larger vocabulary and accurate pronunciation. Youth: 12-20 year-olds studying secondary languages in schools Sales & Marketing Strategy We have technology that allows us to build psychological profiles and predict users' behaviours without accessing their sensitive data. We can build bespoke learning paths, custom sales funnels, and target ads. The data gathered allow the pursue of three main objectives: optimzing marketing resources by leveraging predictive machine learning models creating individual learning paths based on users needs upsale of particular content or products Competitors The language learning apps space looks crowded but in fact there is a specific empty niche - passive learning. There are a lot of language learning apps on the market, but none of them use a passive learning method to save time for their users - Worddio is the only one that does. We are opening a new market group to support language learning. The Worddio app is a pseudo-passive learning app powered by AI which saves student time. Competitive Advantage Worddio main advantages are: - our app’s passive learning method  - huge stock of professionally recorded audio-flashcards in 34 languages. - scientific-based approach that leverages ML and AI to optimize costs and improve user experience - premium content section - AI features that will help us deliver the ultimate hands-free experience to our users.

Our solution ensures accuracy, consistency, and efficiency with its real-time grammar and style improvements, AI-generated insights, and smooth editing features.  Businesses may increase overall content quality, preserve brand consistency, and maximize their communication strategy by simplifying the writing process. Our AI assistant, which is designed for marketers, writers, entrepreneurs, and corporate professionals, can adapt to a variety of writing styles and tones to provide outputs that are specifically tailored to the needs of the industry and certain brand voices.  Our technology revolutionises content development by offering users with intelligent writing support, allowing experts to create polished, impactful, and strategically produced contents more quickly and accurately.
